author: ehu
msg: Part of issue 2607: .svn/entries rewritten on each committed item.
Make recursive processing of committed items efficient.
Timing of the 'script-recurse' script attached to the issue:
update the given leaf-path (non-directory) after being committed.
(svn_wc_process_committed4): Use 1 logfile for all items in the
current directory (instead of 1 log per target), running that log
when all work in the current directory is done.

msg: Fix bogus test failure in checkout_tests.py introduced in r21463.

author: wein
msg: Add support for replaced paths to mailer.py. These paths are now
reported as 'Replaced' and not as 'Added' any more.
Add separate lists for replaced paths.
Add rendering of lists of replaced paths.

msg: Use new parameter action of class ChangedPath instead of parameter
